name: Hunger's Adventure
description:
Hi!  I'm Hungerhaken_,  a German youtuber, this is the official game of my channel, so if you are here please consider a subscription to my channel!! Thanks a lot! 
This is a funny platform game, your task is take all the coins and run until the end without die, the game si composed by 10 levels with a lot of enemies to avoid!!! You can play this game with a PS4 or a XBOX controller too!!
My channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9mcq_ANpHpnJJ1CgDFO9A
